result.eng: Trick or treat!
result.ga: Bob nó bia
result.orig: Bob nó bia
result.html: Bob nó biaTrick or treat!
result.ponchtml: Bob nó biaTrick or treat!

result.eng: Do you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?
result.ga: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaile
result.orig: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaile
result.html: An itheann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireacht sa bhaileDo you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?
result.ponchtml: An iṫeann tú i mbialanna nó an mbíonn tú ag cócaireaċt sa ḃaileDo you eat in restaurants or do you cook at home?

result.eng: At sea or on land?
result.ga: Ar farraige nó ar talamh
result.orig: Ar farraige nó ar talamh
result.html: Ar farraige nó ar talamhAt sea or on land?
result.ponchtml: Ar farraige nó ar talaṁAt sea or on land?

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ga: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.orig: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.html: Bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeachtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé idir ḋá ċoṁairle ar ċóir dom fanaċt nó imeaċtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.

result.eng: Which would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ga: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.orig: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caife
result.html: Cé acu ab fhearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu ab ḟearr leat tae nó caifeWhich would you prefer, tea or coffee?

result.eng: True or false?
result.ga: Fíor nó bréagach
result.orig: Fíor nó bréagach
result.html: Fíor nó bréagachTrue or false?
result.ponchtml: Fíor nó bréagaċTrue or false?

result.eng: She doesn't eat fruits or vegetables.
result.ga: Ní itheann sí glasraí ná torthaí
result.orig: Ní itheann sí glasraí ná torthaí
result.html: Ní itheann sí glasraí ná torthaíShe doesn't eat fruits or vegetables.
result.ponchtml: Ní iṫeann sí glasraí ná torṫaíShe doesn't eat fruits or vegetables.

result.eng: She walked a step or two.
result.ga: Shiúil sí céim nó dhó
result.orig: Shiúil sí céim nó dhó
result.html: Shiúil sí céim nó dhóShe walked a step or two.
result.ponchtml: Ṡiúil sí céim nó ḋóShe walked a step or two.

result.eng: It's only a block or two from the theater.
result.ga: Níl sé ach bloc nó dhó ón amharclann
result.orig: Níl sé ach bloc nó dhó ón amharclann
result.html: Níl sé ach bloc nó dhó ón amharclannIt's only a block or two from the theater.
result.ponchtml: Níl sé aċ bloc nó ḋó ón aṁarclannIt's only a block or two from the theater.

result.eng: I sing a song or two.
result.ga: Casaim amhrán nó dhó
result.orig: Casaim amhrán nó dhó
result.html: Casaim amhrán nó dhóI sing a song or two.
result.ponchtml: Casaim aṁrán nó ḋóI sing a song or two.

result.eng: What about buying something in Standún's Shop or in the Craft Village in An Spidéal?
result.ga: Céard faoi rud eicínt a cheannacht i siopa Standúin nó i gCeardlann an Spidéil
result.orig: Céard faoi rud eicínt a cheannacht i siopa Standúin nó i gCeardlann an Spidéil
result.html: Céard faoi rud eicínt a cheannacht i siopa Standúin nó i gCeardlann an SpidéilWhat about buying something in Standún's Shop or in the Craft Village in An Spidéal?
result.ponchtml: Céard faoi rud eicínt a ċeannaċt i siopa Standúin nó i gCeardlann an SpidéilWhat about buying something in Standún's Shop or in the Craft Village in An Spidéal?

result.eng: The green one with "Éire" written on it or this one?
result.ga: An ceann uaine le Éire scríofa air nó an ceann seo
result.orig: An ceann uaine le Éire scríofa air nó an ceann seo
result.html: An ceann uaine le Éire scríofa air nó an ceann seoThe green one with "Éire" written on it or this one?
result.ponchtml: An ceann uaine le Éire scríofa air nó an ceann seoThe green one with "Éire" written on it or this one?

result.eng: Do you have any brothers or sisters at all?
result.ga: An bhfuil deartháir nó deirfiúr ar bith agat
result.orig: An bhfuil deartháir nó deirfiúr ar bith agat
result.html: An bhfuil deartháir nó deirfiúr ar bith agatDo you have any brothers or sisters at all?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil dearṫáir nó deirfiúr ar biṫ agatDo you have any brothers or sisters at all?

result.eng: Which of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó SiobhánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sine tusa nó SioḃánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?

result.eng: I have to go, or I'll be late.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanach
result.orig: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanach
result.html: Caithfidh mé imeacht nó beidh mé deireanachI have to go, or I'll be late.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé imeaċt nó beiḋ mé deireanaċI have to go, or I'll be late.

result.eng: I never go out Wednesday or Thursday night.
result.ga: Ní théim amach choíche Dé Céadaoin ná Déardaoin
result.orig: Ní théim amach choíche Dé Céadaoin ná Déardaoin
result.html: Ní théim amach choíche Dé Céadaoin ná DéardaoinI never go out Wednesday or Thursday night.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṫéim amaċ ċoíċe Dé Céadaoin ná DéardaoinI never go out Wednesday or Thursday night.

result.eng: I have no brothers or sisters – I'm an only child.
result.ga: Níl deartháir ná deirfiúr ar bith agam – is páiste aonair mé
result.orig: Níl deartháir ná deirfiúr ar bith agam – is páiste aonair mé
result.html: Níl deartháir ná deirfiúr ar bith agam – is páiste aonair méI have no brothers or sisters – I'm an only child.
result.ponchtml: Níl dearṫáir ná deirfiúr ar biṫ agam – is páiste aonair méI have no brothers or sisters – I'm an only child.

result.eng: And I often go to a play or a film as well.
result.ga: Agus téim chuig dráma nó chuig scannán go minic freisin
result.orig: Agus téim chuig dráma nó chuig scannán go minic freisin
result.html: Agus téim chuig dráma nó chuig scannán go minic freisinAnd I often go to a play or a film as well.
result.ponchtml: Agus téim ċuig dráma nó ċuig scannán go minic freisinAnd I often go to a play or a film as well.

result.eng: I'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.
result.ga: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhó
result.orig: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhó
result.html: Bím an-tuirseach tar éis na hoibre ach téim amach oíche nó dhóI'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.
result.ponchtml: Bím an-tuirseaċ tar éis na hoibre aċ téim amaċ oíċe nó ḋóI'm very tired after work but I go out one or two nights.

result.eng: I usually go to a concert or a music session.
result.ga: Téim chuig ceolchoirm nó chuig seisiún ceoil de ghnáth
result.orig: Téim chuig ceolchoirm nó chuig seisiún ceoil de ghnáth
result.html: Téim chuig ceolchoirm nó chuig seisiún ceoil de ghnáthI usually go to a concert or a music session.
result.ponchtml: Téim ċuig ceolċoirm nó ċuig seisiún ceoil de ġnáṫI usually go to a concert or a music session.

result.eng: I must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ga: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.orig: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céanna
result.html: Caithfidh gur bhuail mé leo uair nó dhó ó d'ith muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ gur ḃuail mé leo uair nó ḋó ó d'iṫ muid sna bialanna céannaI must have met them once or twice because we ate in the same restaurants.

result.eng: But from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ga: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.orig: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontu
result.html: Ó am go chéile áfach bhíodh seoid ghrinn tuairimíochta nó léirmheas géarchúiseach le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.
result.ponchtml: Ó am go ċéile áfaċ ḃíoḋ seoid ġrinn tuairimíoċta nó léirṁeas géarċúiseaċ le fáil iontuBut from time to time you could find in them [ie. in blogs] a sharp opinionated treasure or a shrewd review.

result.eng: In addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ga: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.orig: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáil
result.html: Anuas ar sin ní thig éalú ó ghnáthchúraimí an tsaoil a thiteann ar dhuine ar nós airgead a thuilleamh nó clann a thógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.
result.ponchtml: Anuas ar sin ní ṫig éalú ó ġnáṫċúraimí an tsaoil a ṫiteann ar ḋuine ar nós airgead a ṫuilleaṁ nó clann a ṫógáilIn addition to that, you cannot escape from the ordinary responsiblities life throws at you such as making money or raising a family.

result.eng: You wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ga: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.orig: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líne
result.html: Ní bheifeá ag súil leis an doimhneacht chéanna tuairimíochta uathu is a bheadh ó phostálacha níba fhaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeifeá ag súil leis an doiṁneaċt ċéanna tuairimíoċta uaṫu is a ḃeaḋ ó ṗostálaċa níba ḟaide ar nós blag nó colún ar líneYou wouldn't expect the same opiniated depth from them as you would from longer posts such as blogs or online columns.

result.eng: There'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ga: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.orig: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leo
result.html: Ní bheadh gar domhsa nó duitse a bheith ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḃeaḋ gar doṁsa nó duitse a ḃeiṫ ag caint leoThere'd be no point for you or me talking to them.

result.eng: She'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ga: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.orig: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé mise
result.html: B'fhada i dteach na mbocht nó ag cruinniú na déirce í ach go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!
result.ponchtml: B'ḟada i dteaċ na mboċt nó ag cruinniú na déirce í aċ go bé miseShe'd long be in the poor house or begging somewhere if it wasn't for me!

result.eng: That's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ga: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.orig: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéal
result.html: Táthar á chur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.
result.ponchtml: Táṫar á ċur sin air cibé acu fíor bréag an scéalThat's what they say about him, be it true or false.

result.eng: He was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ga: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.orig: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leis
result.html: Bhí sé eadar dhá chómhairle cé acu a bhéarfadh sé leis an príosúnach nó a ligfeadh sé a cheann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé eadar ḋá ċóṁairle cé acu a ḃéarfaḋ sé leis an príosúnaċ nó a ligfeaḋ sé a ċeann leisHe was undecided whether he should take the prisoner with him or let him go.
